SEARCH

Class VocabList.WordList

java.lang.Object
VocabList.WordList
Enclosing class:
VocabList
public class VocabList.WordList extends Object
The single linked list class, titled WordList, used to hold WordNodes which contain Strings associated to the words in each topic.

    VocabList.WordList.WordNode
    The node object for the singly-linked WordList.

  • Method Details

    • searchFor

      public int searchFor(String word)
      Parses through a WordList and returns the number of times a certain word is found.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to check for
      Returns:
      the number of times that word appears in a list.

    • searchForLetter

      public void searchForLetter(String letter)
      This is option 8's primary function. It runs through all words in a given WordList, adds the ones starting with the passed letter to an arraylist, then sorts it through "natural order" or alphabetical order.
      Parameters:
      letter - the letter to check for at the start of words.

    • printWordList

      public void printWordList()
      Prints the word list, keeping them neatly presented in 4 columns (4 words per line)

    • addWord

      public void addWord(String newWord)
      Adds a new word to the list.
      Parameters:
      newWord - the word to add.

    • modifyWord

      public void modifyWord(String wordToBe, String newWord)
      Changes an existing word to another one specified by the user.
      Parameters:
      wordToBe - the word to impact by the change
      newWord - the new word to replace the old one by

    • removeWord

      public void removeWord(String toRemove)
      Removes a word from the list.
      Parameters:
      toRemove - the word to remove.

    • extracted

      public void extracted(VocabList.VocabNode current, PrintWriter writer)
      Runs through a vocab node's word list to extract and write each word to a file.
      Parameters:
      current - the vocab node to parse through
      writer - the PrintWriter to use for writing to a file.

    • deleteDuplicateWords

      public static int deleteDuplicateWords(VocabList.VocabNode current)
      Loops through a wordlist and uses removeWord() on any duplicate words found.
      Parameters:
      current - the VocabNode to pass through
      Returns:
      the number of deleted, duplicate words.
